list.title: basic
list.description: Browser Usage: See the Pen Untitled by Jonathan Todd (@jt0dd1995) on CodePen. Node.js Usage: Create

list.title: LLMGenie#improve
list.description: Improve the input text with given settings and tracker, returns the improved result.

list.title: LLMGenie#query
list.description: Query the GPT model with given settings and tracker returns the generated results.

list.title: LLMGenie#queryBoolean
list.description: Query GPT model for boolean output with given settings and tracker, returns "yes" or "no".

list.title: LLMGenie#queryGuideConstraint
list.description: Query GPT model to guide and transform output to meet constraint requirements with givensettings and tracker, returns the generated result.

list.title: LLMGenie#queryList
list.description: Query GPT model in list format with given settings and tracker, returns the generatedresult in a bulleted list.

list.title: LLMGenie#queryNumberedList
list.description: Query GPT model in numbered list format with given settings and tracker, returns thegenerated result in a numbered list.

list.title: LLMGenie#queryValid
list.description: Query GPT model with given settings and tracker for valid output, returns the generated result.
